about_the_game:
The Ultimate VR Food Truck Odyssey Awaits!





Step into the bustling world of "Grill on Wheels". Navigate through vibrant cityscapes and immerse yourself in a culinary journey where every decision counts. Dive deep into this VR adventure and rise from a humble food truck chef to a culinary legend.

Key Features


Immersive VR Gameplay: Experience every slice, grill sizzle, and customer interaction in vivid VR.
Deep Customization: Tailor every inch of your truck. From equipment upgrades to aesthetic designs, make the truck truly yours.
Strategic Planning: Master the art of strategy. Plan your ingredient purchases, set your menu, and decide on pricing to maximize profits.
Dynamic 3D World: Engage with lifelike environments, from the bustling marketplaces to the demanding streets filled with hungry patrons.
Progressive Challenges: As you advance, the streets get more demanding, offering richer rewards for those who strategize effectively.

Your Kitchen, Your Rules


From the confines of your garage to the heart of the city, every decision you make impacts your journey. Strategize your daily tasks, from ingredient sourcing to kitchen layout, and feel the weight of every choice as the day unfolds.

A Journey Of One


This solo odyssey challenges your managerial acumen and culinary skills. As orders pour in and the clock ticks away, will your strategies set you apart or will you crumble under pressure?

Evolving Streets


Adapt to the ever-changing demands of the city. From unpredictable weather to rare ingredients, the scale of the challenges with your growing reputation.

"Grill on Wheels" isn't just a cooking game; it's a tale of ambition, choices, and the aroma of freshly grilled burgers. Embrace the grind, make strategic choices, and carve out your legacy in the food truck world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC

short_description: Dive into the immersive world of VR food truck mastery! Prep, grill, and serve delicious burgers. Manage your dynamic mobile kitchen, customize it to your heart's content, strategize ingredient use, and become the ultimate street chef in this captivating VR culinary adventure!
